rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a foyer leading to the living area and guest areas.
An open-plan living room integrated with the kitchen, offering a modern yet traditional aesthetic.
Open plan kitchen with ample storage and work space. Incorporates Vastu principles for alignment of cooking area to the south-east.
A semi-open dining area adjacent to the kitchen and living room.
Private master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Placed in a Vastu-optimized location for restful sleep.
Child's bedroom located in the north-west sector according to Vastu principles.
Second child's bedroom placed in the north-east zone for positive energy flow.
Guest room located near the entrance to offer convenience while maintaining privacy.
Common bathroom for guests and utility purposes, adhering to Vastu guidelines for water placements.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned in the south-west to align with positive energy flow.
Multiple windows on different facades to ensure proper ventilation and natural light as per Vastu recommendations.
Window alcove in the south-east for enhanced lighting and air circulation.

rooms.description: Master bedroom on the upper floor with access to a private terrace.
Child's bedroom in the north-east zone for optimal Vastu alignment.
Second child's bedroom positioned for balanced energy flow.
Study room with integrated storage and ample natural light from the east-facing window.

openings.description: Balcony access door leading to a terrace with panoramic views.
Windows designed for adequate light and air flow.

design_notes: This design incorporates Chettinad style architectural elements, open-plan living space with integrated kitchen and dining area, and strict adherence to Vastu principles for optimum energy flow. The layout is planned to maximize natural light and ventilation while respecting local building norms.
